Meet the Artist

~ Manisha Chanda ~

" Hi, I am Manisha. I am from Paschim Medinipur district of West Bengal. I am a zoology student who love arts. I love to do artistics things because they feed my soul. Whenever I receive an order or just I feel like doing, I just open up my heart to draw and paint and cannot stop myself completing it in just as perfect as it can be."

Ruprekha
